response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the fridge without any errors. The next step is to open the fridge.

(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the potato from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the oven.
(5) Open the oven.
(6) Put the potato inside the oven.
(7) Cook the potato.
(8) Open the oven.
(9) Grasp the cooked potato from the oven.
(10) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(11) Open the bottom cabinet.
(12) Grasp the platter from the bottom cabinet.
(13) Put the cooked potato on the platter.
(14) Move the robot to the table.
(15) Put the platter with the cooked potato on the table.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Open the fridge.
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
